main.description_header: GraphiQL is a playground/IDE for graphQL requests. This project is part of Rolling Scopes School React Course. The Rolling Scopes is an independent international community of developers (mainly JavaScript / Front-end / iOS / Android), organized in 2013. Currently, many developers around the world know that we participate in our events and activities. You can find task description and requirements

error.message404: The page you are looking for might be in another universe.
error.message500: Our team of highly trained monkeys has been dispatched to deal with this situation.

firstname.matches: Firstname should start with an uppercase letter and should be valid

lastname.matches: Lastname should start with an uppercase letter and should be valid
